testsuite.name: Scenario: Use an uninstalled candidate version of an installed candidate and it does not become default

testcase.name: Given the internet is reachable
testcase.classname: Scenario: Use an uninstalled candidate version of an installed candidate and it does not become default

testcase.name: And an initialised environment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Use an uninstalled candidate version of an installed candidate and it does not become default

testcase.name: Given the candidate "grails" version "1.3.9" is already installed and default
testcase.classname: Scenario: Use an uninstalled candidate version of an installed candidate and it does not become default

testcase.name: And the candidate "grails" version "2.1.0" is available for download
testcase.classname: Scenario: Use an uninstalled candidate version of an installed candidate and it does not become default

testcase.name: And the system is bootstrapped
testcase.classname: Scenario: Use an uninstalled candidate version of an installed candidate and it does not become default

testcase.name: When I enter "sdk use grails 2.1.0" and answer "Y"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Use an uninstalled candidate version of an installed candidate and it does not become default

testcase.name: Then I do not see "Setting grails version 1.3.9 as default."
testcase.classname: Scenario: Use an uninstalled candidate version of an installed candidate and it does not become default

testcase.name: And I see "Using grails version 2.1.0 in this shell."
testcase.classname: Scenario: Use an uninstalled candidate version of an installed candidate and it does not become default

testcase.name: And the candidate "grails" version "2.1.0" is installed
testcase.classname: Scenario: Use an uninstalled candidate version of an installed candidate and it does not become default

testcase.name: And the candidate "grails" version "1.3.9" should be the default
testcase.classname: Scenario: Use an uninstalled candidate version of an installed candidate and it does not become default

testcase.classname: Scenario: Use an uninstalled candidate version of an installed candidate and it does not become default
